mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xueyuan_id as xueyuanId ,a.jiaolian_id as jiaolianId ,a.kaoshi_uuid_number as kaoshiUuidNumber ,a.kaoshi_name as kaoshiName ,a.kaoshi_types as kaoshiTypes ,a.kaoshi_number as kaoshiNumber ,a.tongguo_types as tongguoTypes ,a.kaoshi_content as kaoshiContent ,a.kaoshi_time as kaoshiTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jiaolian.jiaolian_name as jiaolianName ,jiaolian.jiaolian_phone as jiaolianPhone ,jiaolian.jiaolian_id_number as jiaolianIdNumber ,jiaolian.jiaolian_photo as jiaolianPhoto ,jiaolian.jiaolian_email as jiaolianEmail ,xueyuan.xueyuan_name as xueyuanName ,xueyuan.xueyuan_phone as xueyuanPhone ,xueyuan.xueyuan_id_number as xueyuanIdNumber ,xueyuan.xueyuan_photo as xueyuanPhoto ,xueyuan.xueyuan_email as xueyuanEmail
FROM kaoshi a left JOIN jiaolian jiaolian ON a.jiaolian_id = jiaolian.id left JOIN xueyuan xueyuan ON a.xueyuan_id = xueyuan.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.xueyuan_id = #{params.xueyuanId} )
and ( a.jiaolian_id = #{params.jiaolianId} )
and a.kaoshi_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.kaoshiUuidNumber},'%')
and a.kaoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.kaoshiName},'%')
and a.kaoshi_types = #{params.kaoshiTypes}
and a.kaoshi_number >= #{params.kaoshiNumberStart}
and a.kaoshi_number <= #{params.kaoshiNumberEnd}
and a.tongguo_types = #{params.tongguoTypes}
and a.kaoshi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.kaoshiContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaoshi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaoshiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaoshi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaoshiTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.jiaolian_id IS NOT NULL
and jiaolian.jiaolian_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianName},'%')
and jiaolian.jiaolian_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianPhone},'%')
and jiaolian.jiaolian_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianIdNumber},'%')
and jiaolian.jiaolian_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianEmail},'%')
and a.xueyuan_id IS NOT NULL
and xueyuan.xueyuan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueyuanName},'%')
and xueyuan.xueyuan_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueyuanPhone},'%')
and xueyuan.xueyuan_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueyuanIdNumber},'%')
and xueyuan.xueyuan_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueyuanEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
